How about adding a ninja to our mix?  Or a promotion on our basic 
soldier?

How about adding halfing classes (mixture of two character types) if 
they both have experience levels above 20? Like combining a 'High 
Priest' with an 'Archmage' would result in two characters which each 
have half its original abilites and half the abilities of the other 
one.  The catch: all the specials must be present between the two of 
them: example both of them couldn't have the power of 'Heal', 'Summon 
Image/Summon Fire Elemental', etc.  You could NOT put halfings in a 
scenario to fight against.  

In case you were wondering, my combination of those two would be one 
having 'Wide area heal/Greater Heal', "Resurrect/Reincarinate', 
'Teleport/Leave teleporter marker', and 'Summon Image/Summon Fire 
Elemental'; the other half would have the rest of the abilites of 
both.
